"Which ever way you want." Megatron informed him. "Astroblast can give
you a ride if need be." Megatron got a sly look on his face at the idea
of Slaughter. "Motormaster, shake whatever is wrong with you off, and
MERGE." He yelled, turning his attention back to the two new members.

Wildrider smacked Motormaster, who shook his head, and transformed into
his truck mode. Wildrider followed into his car mode.
